[START woosmap_http_distance_matrix]
https://api.woosmap.com/distance/distancematrix/json
  ?destinations=48.709%2C2.303%7C48.768%2C2.338
  &elements=duration_distance
  &language=en
  &method=distance
  &mode=driving
  &origins=48.709%2C2.403
  &key=YOUR_PUBLIC_API_KEY
[END woosmap_http_distance_matrix]
